news.Title: [AI Summary] 采鈺完成限制員工權利新股註銷 實收資本額變更登記
news.Content:
台灣股市上市公司采鈺（6789）於2025年11月26日發布公告，說明其限制員工權利新股的收回註銷事宜已完成，並辦理了實收資本額的變更登記。

根據公告，此項資本變動已於2025年11月25日獲得主管機關核准，並同步完成了資本變更登記。此次操作對公司的財務報告產生了影響，主要體現在實收資本額與流通在外股數的差異。在限制員工權利新股股份註銷減資前，采鈺的實收資本額為新台幣3,183,141,190元，流通在外股數為318,314,119股，每股淨值為新台幣57.02元。減資完成後，實收資本額調整為新台幣3,182,991,190元，流通在外股數變為318,299,119股，每股淨值則維持在57.02元。

公司方面表示，本次變動不涉及換股作業計畫，減資後新股上市的普通股股數亦不適用。此外，關於股權流通性偏低之因應措施也未被提及。此次公告主要為例行性的公司治理及資本結構調整，預期對公司短期營運及股價的直接影響需要進一步觀察市場反應。

資料來源：[1] Yahoo奇摩股市 ([https://tw.stock.yahoo.com/news/公告-采鈺限制員工權利新股收回註銷完成實收資本額變更登記事宜-092144902.html](https://tw.stock.yahoo.com/news/公告-采鈺限制員工權利新股收回註銷完成實收資本額變更登記事宜-092144902.html))

news.Title: [AI Summary] VisEra Completes Deregistration of Employee Stock Options, Modifies Registered Capital
news.Content:
• VisEra announced the completion of its deregistration of employee stock options, leading to a slight adjustment in its registered capital and outstanding shares.
• The company's registered capital has been revised to NT$3,182,991,190, with outstanding shares now at 318,299,119, while the net asset per share remains at NT$57.02. [1]
• VisEra has officially completed the deregistration of its restricted employee stock options, a process that has also led to a formal modification of the company's registered capital. According to the announcement made on November 26, 2025, the relevant authorities approved the capital reduction on November 25, 2025, and the company subsequently completed the necessary registration. Prior to this adjustment, VisEra's paid-in capital stood at NT$3,183,141,190, with 318,314,119 shares outstanding, and a net asset per share of NT$57.02. Following the completion of the deregistration, the paid-in capital has been adjusted to NT$3,182,991,190, and the number of outstanding shares is now 318,299,119. The net asset per share remains unchanged at NT$57.02. The company has indicated that this capital adjustment does not involve any share exchange plans and that further details regarding the listing of new shares post-reduction are not applicable. Additionally, no specific measures for low stock liquidity have been outlined. This corporate action is primarily a procedural adjustment to the company's capital structure and governance. The market's reaction and any potential impact on VisEra's stock price will be subject to ongoing observation. [1]
